alert.note: Alert for Cameron; Northern Clinton; Potter; Tioga (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 1:16AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT POTTER...EASTERN CAMERON... NORTHWESTERN TIOGA AND NORTHWESTERN CLINTON COUNTIES THROUGH 145 AM EDT... At 116 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of Wellsville to near St. Marys. Movement was east at 70 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cameron, Wharton, Coudersport, Emporium, Roulette, Shinglehouse, Genesee, Harrison Valley, Stevenson Dam, Cherry Springs State Park, Keating Summit, Denton Hill State Park, Lyman Run State Park, Sizerville, Ulysses, Austin, Sweden Valley, Oswayo, Driftwood and Ski Denton Ski Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
